reviews.comments: Monoambiente muy lindo y decorado con muy buen gusto .Espacios optimizados , en un hermoso edificio muy bien ubicado con vista magnifica y una anfitriona ( Cynthia ) super.!!! Lo super recomiendo
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias, fue un placer haberlos recibido!

reviews.comments: Inmejorable ubicación y hermoso el departamento! Nos encantó y tuvimos uma excelente estadía! Nos recibió Laura y fue muy amable, nos dio muchas recomendaciones!
Tiene una vista increíble de la ciudad, el departamento esta como nos muestran las fotos..
reviews.response: Un placer Recibirte siempre! Gracias por dejar todo impecable :)

reviews.comments: Todo excelente

El departamento es moderno, muy completo y con una vista que quita el aliento. 
Los atardeceres son deslumbrantes, una atracción más de Buenos Aires.
reviews.response: Muchisimas Gracias! Fue un Placer!!

reviews.comments:
Realmente hermoso, todo de primera calidad muy completo y confortable. 
Para tenerlo en cuenta siempre. 
Gracias Cynthia.
reviews.response: Muchisimas gracis! Bienvenidos cuando quieran

reviews.comments: Precioso el departamento! tal cual las fotos, impecable, así como el trato de la anfitriona. No dudo en volver!! Lo recomiendo ampliamente. Gracias Cynthia!
reviews.response: Mil Gracias! Un placer recibirlos a ambos! Vuelvan cuando quieran

reviews.comments: Muy bueno

El lugar es lo máximo, bien ubicado a unas cuadras de la estación del subte (plaza italia) buenos lugares cerca, una vista de lujo para cerrar jornada de turismo con un vinito, fui con mis padres y todo ha salido 1A. Más que recomendado. Gracias!
reviews.response: LA verdad es que son un encanto!

reviews.comments: El studio de Cynthia es maravilloso. Muy bien situado en Palermo. Cynthia es super nice y muy comunicativa. Nos recibio Laura una fabulosa senora que nos mostro todo en el studio y hasta nos llevo a caminar por el vecindario y nos mostro las tiendas claves. De verdad quedamos encantados de tan hermoso lugar en el lindo Buenos Aires.
reviews.response: Gracias Miles. Ustedes fueron un encanto. Bienvenidos cuando gusten!

reviews.comments: Un depa con una vista inmejorable, súper céntrico, restaurants, shopping, tiendecitas, acceso a transporte público y a la zona súper chic de Palermo a pocas cuadras,  todo es walking distance.  Muy seguro.  Solamente es pequeño y no lo recomendaría para más de dos personas.  En general muy bueno y regresaría con gusto.
Es un estudio muy completo con unas vistas espectaculares.
reviews.response: Fue un gran placer recibirlos ;)

reviews.comments:
muy buena anfitriona .El apartamento esta muy bien puesto , es comodo y muy bien ubicado
Ideal para una pareja y dos niñas
reviews.response:
Gracias Rafael por venir! Fue un gran placer tenerte!
Espero recibirlos en una nueva oportunidad

reviews.comments: Recomendable
Buena ubicacion. Un poco chico para 4 personas.

Fuimos a Buenos Aires con una amiga. El apartamento genial. Sobre todo la seguridad y facilidades del mismo. No hubo problemas de ningún tipo. Nos atendió Laura, quien nos trató de manera maravillosa y no nos sacó mucho tiempo. La ubicación es fantástica y la comodidad del departamento genial. Sin duda volveríamos!!!
reviews.response: Mil Gracias, Una alegría saber que pasaron una buena estadía

reviews.comments: Desde un inicio fue muy clara y metodica todo como lo describio y muy atenta a detalles
Cynthia estuvo pendiente todo el tiempo. Siempre amable y dispuesta a ayudar. El departamento ofrece una vista de Buenos Aires fabulosas y està muy bien comunicado.
buenísimo piso y habitación, La estadía fue perfecto, Cynthia es muy atenciosa.
reviews.response: Gracias Ray!

reviews.comments: Impecable el apartamento y excelente atención, totalmente recomendado!
reviews.response: Un Placer!

reviews.comments:
La experiencia fue simplemente genial! El depa es tal cual muestran las fotos publicadas.
Estaban esperando cuando llegamos y nos permitieron dejar nuestras maletas en el departamento incluso antes de la hora de check-in.
El barrio es muy seguro, cerca de todo en Palermo. 
La seguridad buenísima, tanto en el mismo depa como a nivel del edificio (conserje las 24 horas).

Mil gracias a Cynthia y a Laura por está genial estadía! Lo recomiendo a ojos cerrados
reviews.response: MIl Gracias! Fue un Placer recibirlas!!

reviews.comments: Excelente. Muy recomendado.
El apartamento y la zona son muy agradables, nos hubiera gustado conocer a Cynthia pero no se dio la oportunidad.
reviews.response: Gracias! Bienvenido nuevamente en una próxima oportunidad!

reviews.comments: Hola Cynthia, nos encanto el departamento, el lugar y el barrio. Vos y Laura fueron muy serviciales a nuestras preguntas y necesidades. Nos recibieron muy bien. La vista desde el departamento es hermosa y el servicio de seguridad del edificio muy eficiente y amables. Muchas gracias por todo. Un abrazo.
reviews.response: Muchisimas Gracias! Un placer

reviews.comments: Cynthia fue muy responsiva y amable desde que hice la reservación. El apartamento es tal y como se describe. La vista desde el piso 21 es sencillamente espectacular. En el área hay muy buenos restaurantes y una parada de metro a menos de 10 minutos caminando. A nuestra entrada Cynthia nos permitió hacer check-in antes del mediodía porque el apartamento estaba disponible y a nuestro check-out nos hizo disponible un área de almacén para dejar nuestras maletas hasta la tarde. Muy amable de su parte. En fin, un gran apartamento y una gran experiencia. Definitivamente lo recomiendo.

Fuimos 4 amigas al departamento de Cinthia en Palermo y tuvimos una gran experiencia. El departamento es tal como lo muestran las fotos. Increible la funcionalidad y comodidad del espacio, hermosamente decorado y comlpetamente equipado. Impactante vista y exelente ubicacion a pasos  de restaurantes, negocios y transporte. Además Cinthia y Laura, quien nos ayudó siempre estuvieron disponibles a acoger todas nuestras preguntas. Completamente recomendado.
reviews.response: Muchisimas Gracias, Un placer

reviews.comments: El departamento de Cynthia es espectacular! Tiene una vista que realmente podes ver gran parte de Buenos Aires y unos atardeceres que te dejan sin aliento. Cynthia nos atendio muy bien y dejo el departamento con muchas recomendaciones con cosas que hacer en la ciudad. Definitivamente volveremos! Gracias Cynthia
reviews.response: Mil Gracias Leo, bienvenido a todo momento!

reviews.comments:
Lindo departamento una vista espectacular todo en hora Cynthia  estuvo muy pendiente de nuestra llegada y nos dio muchos  tips para nuestra  estadía indicándonos donde conseguir víveres, transporte y comercio.
Muuuchos detalles en el depa hasta cafe azúcar  y prod de limpieza todo lo que podíamos necesitar muy bien equipado y decorado edificio espectacular seguro vecindario tranquilo cerca al " subte" con una vista maravillosa de Palermo regresare sin pensarlo 100% recomendable.  Gracias Cynthia!
reviews.response: Andrea, mil gracias, me encanta saber que estuvieron a gusto y disfrutaron su estadia. Un placer recibirlos anytime

reviews.comments: Departamento tal cual las fotos, muy limpio, excelente ubicación y sin problema alguno para entrar. La anfitriona muy accesible cuando fue necesaria.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Jesus, hasta una nueva vez en Buenos Aires

reviews.comments:
Cynthia es super amable y cariñosa. Nos esperó bastante ya que nuestro vuelo se demoró un par de horas más en llegar. El departamento es tal cual a las fotos, super limpio, ordenado, linda decoración, la vista increíble y full equipado.
Esta en un barrio muy agradable con muy buenos restaurantes cerca a una cuadra del metro.
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias María! Fue un placer! Hasta la próxima.

reviews.comments: Pasamos una hermosa estadía en el departamento de Cynthia. Era exactamente como ella lo había describido, así que no hubo ninguna sorpresa desagradable ni mucho menos. Ella nos recibió el día que arribamos y nos explicó todo con claridad absoluta. Si bien en este viaje no necesitamos de los servicios que ofrece el edificio (lavandería, gimnasio y spa), es bueno saber que están disponibles. En otras visitas estaríamos dispuestos a parar ahí de nuevo, y en verano usaríamos la pileta al aire libre. El barrio muy tranquilo y la ubicación a pocas cuadras de la Plaza Italia, donde paran el subte, varios colectivos, taxis, etc. También queda cerca de los bosques de Palermo, donde fuimos a correr un día. En síntesis, todo muy agradable.

Cynthia was wonderful to deal with during the entire rental process and Laura who managed  our check in could not have been more helpful. Thank for such a fantastic stay in your beautiful home. A fantastic apt, with everything we needed to help enhance our stay in BA. Perfect for a couple.
Amazing apartment with glorious views of the city, less than a 5 min walk t the nearest subway. Great bars and restaurants about 5-10 min walk! Definitely recommended!
reviews.response: Its a real pleasure to host you!

reviews.comments: Such a great pad! Will be back! Thanks for everything Cynthia!
reviews.response: It was a pleasure!!

reviews.comments: The appartment is exactly as described and it absolutely met my requirements: location was great, it was very quiet (a must for me in a noisy city like Buenos Aires), the unit had AC and swimming pool (great for hot Summer months) and everything else was exactly as described. Also the beds were very comfortable and Cynthia provides plenty of pillows.
reviews.response: Mil Gracias Lila por tu lindo review, Bienvenidos nuevamente cuando gustes! Feliz Año!

reviews.comments: Thank you for a very pleasant stay in your lovely apartment - we really recommend it for stays in BA. Very good location.
reviews.response: It was a pleasure!

reviews.comments: Perfect apartment for a BA visit. Close to shops, restaurants and transportation
reviews.response: Thanks Errols & Vicky for coming!

reviews.comments: We found the apartment very comfortable and conveniently located. The shopping was easy and we were given an excellent recommendation for exchanging our money.
reviews.response: Thanks Hugh, It was a pleasure to host you

reviews.comments: The Condo is in the perfect location. 5min walk to all the trendy shops and restaurants. The subway is 2mins away which will get you anywhere you want to go in the city. The condo  has the perfect views with an amazing pool.
reviews.response: Thanks Dayna, It was a big pleasure to host you!

reviews.comments: Amazing places : cheap with a great location! Do not miss it of you're visiting Buenos Aires.
reviews.response: Oh, Kevin, what a nice review, thanks

reviews.comments: Cynthia’s place is very nice and the view is unbeatable. Very walkable and close to the subway.
reviews.response: It was a pleasure to host you

reviews.comments:
Outstanding view of the city from the flat! Great amenities, security and everything super clean. Great gym and swimming pool. The location in Palermo can't be better.
We loved the yerba mate touch!
I would definitely recommend it.
This place is awesome! Perfect location amazing view and just pristine. Gym is awesome as well
The apartment was exactly as described. The neighborhood was easy to walk and had lots of great cafes and shops. Subway was nearby. The view is amazing!
reviews.response: Thank you so much! I was a pleasure

reviews.comments: A great place for two people with a breathtaking view of Buenos Aires. The kitchen is full equipped. And the gym has a wonderful view as well and is well-equipped. The pool was unfortunately not open yet but looked amazing. The communication with Cynthia was easy and we got all the information we asked for. Palermo Soho is a nice spot and easy to get around from there.

Really cute spot. The view is a killer. No need to go to any rooftop bar, this apartment has the best view in the city! 
We felt safe walking around and we found so many cute boutiques, speakeasies and restaurants. Will totally be back. Thank Cynthia!
reviews.response: It was a big pleasure!!!

reviews.comments: We loved the apartment and that it was in a safe and secure building with 24 hour security. The area is a beautiful area with plenty of fine restaurants and shopping.
reviews.response: It was a pleasure to host You

reviews.comments: Great location with an amazing view on the city! Perfect for a city trip.
Tolle Lage, Zimmer im 21. Stock mit einen unglaublichen Ausblick! Sehr Gastfreundlich. Tolle Ausstattung und sehr sauber! Können es nur weiterempfehlen! Vielen Dank!!!
reviews.response: Danke Florian & Julian! :$

reviews.comments: I loved this apartment.  The biggest surprise was the incredible sunsets off the balcony! We had a bottle of wine and snacks and enjoyed the sunsets and views . The building has hot tub and sauna but we didn't have time to use it.  The location was amazing.  Close to everything !
reviews.response: Thank you so Much! It was a pleasure!

reviews.comments:
L'appartement offre une vue fabuleuse et se trouve dans un quartier génial à 50m du métro.
Adresse d'exception.
reviews.response: Bonjour Catherine: Merci beaucoup de m'avoir logé dans ma maison et de m'aider à corriger ce qui est nécessaire pour que vous soyez à l'aise.

reviews.comments: All was as described. Very good location and excellent communication prior and during the visit.
reviews.response: Thank You so Much, Michael! Happy to receive you again!

reviews.comments:
Awesome, modern apartment at an amazing location! Beautiful view overlooking Palermo. Palermo was hands down my favorite neighborhood of Buenos Aires in terms of fun, food, and everything else. 

Cynthia is a great host. She is very prepared, super kind, and provides plenty of information and recommendations for those like myself that had never been to BA before. Definitely recommend!
reviews.response: It was a big pleasure!!!!

reviews.comments: Everything was great, amazing view, apartment and neighborhood. Would definitely come back.
reviews.response: Thanks a lot. Welcome always!

reviews.comments: Cyntia was a great host, we were greeted by a friend of hers who showed us around, both ladies were very helpful. The appartment is well located, just by the biggest parks in Plermo Soho and close to the trendy neighborhood with great stores and restaurants. Cynthia let us store our luggage in a luggage room. Overall I recommend this appartment for both the flat as such and the host. cheers v.
reviews.response: It is a big pleasure to host you ;)

reviews.comments:
Great apartment- very clean, very secure with an excellent view. Host went above and beyond in making sure our stay was a memorable one, helping with directions and making suggestions on the best tourist attractions.  
The apartment is in a great location. Close proximity to historical attractions and no shortage of bars and restaurants within meters of the building.
reviews.response: Thanks John, was a big pleasure. I will take your suggestion!

reviews.comments: Beautiful Condo in a well located neighborhood. Close to the SubeTe (Metro), great cafes and fabulous restaurants. Cynthia is a gracious host. This is a great introduction to a sophisticated world class city. Enjoy Buenos Aires.
reviews.response: Thank You so Much! You are wonderful

reviews.comments: Já fiquei aqui outras vezes. O Apartamento é muito limpo e bonito, em uma região muito boa da cidade. A Cynthia além de prestativa é muito simpática! Recomendo!
Check-in with Laura was very helpful and she gave us a lot of great tips about the neighborhood.
reviews.response: Thanks Lindsay. I am happy to know that you have felt comfortable in Buenos Aires

reviews.comments:
O apartamento de Cynthia é incrível e possui a vista MARAVILHOSA. A localização é excelente.
Perfeito pra uma viagem em casal. Cynthia é uma ótima anfitriã. Seria um prazer voltar novamente.
reviews.response: Obrigadisima. razer voltar a receverlos

reviews.comments: Fantastic home in a great location of Buenos Aires. first time in this city and the accommodations could not be any better. wait till you see the view at night. wow.
reviews.response: Thanks Lyn, A pleasure!

reviews.comments: Loved this Place, the Location, the Building and the Area. Totally recommend.
reviews.response: Thanks Jan! Welcome anytime!

reviews.comments:
O apartamento é ideal para um casal, acomoda até 3 pessoas, que foi nosso caso, viajamos com nosso filho adolescente. Estava limpo, tem uma excelente localização, Cynthia foi atenciosa, mantendo contato por mensagem, apesar de nao estar conosco no check in e nem no check out. Um ponto que achamos negativo foi o nivel de barulho, a vizinhança nao respeita o silencio, a ultima noite teve musica alta até tarde da madrugada, bastante incomodo.
Mas mesmo assim recomendamos a hospedagem.

This is a well located Palermo apartment with a stunning view from the balcony. 

Within a few minutes walk of the metro station, as well as Palermo's array of restaurants and bars, the apartment is a great base. 

Both Cynthia and Laura were easy to contact in the lead up to check in. Laura took care in ensuring we were comfortable in the home and understood where things like the local shops and best cafes were. 

The apartment is secure and has round the clock, friendly staff. 

It's clean and fully stocked with kitchen utensils if you want to cook. There's also a good selection of cable channels available. 

The fold down bed is fine, as is the shower and modern bathroom. 

We'd recommend staying here if you want to be close to Palermo's best features in a comfortable apartment.
reviews.response: Thanks a Lot! It was a big pleasure to host you

reviews.comments:
I had a great stay at Cynthias, gracias. It was in a great area with a short stroll up the road to where cafes, bars and restaurant's were. I felt safe walking alone.
I was met by Laura who was very friendly and helpful with guide of city. 
Would love to return one day.
Cynthia's apartment is amazing! Near to public transportation, night life, very good restaurants and much more! We loved this apartment and strongly recomend to stay at Cynthia's apartament.
reviews.response: It was a big pleasure Carlos !

reviews.comments: Everything was great. Great location, very clean and the host (Cynthia) was very attentive. The view is amazing.
reviews.response: Thanks a lot! :) Prazer!

reviews.comments: Beautiful and safe apartment with an amazing view!
reviews.response: Thanks Nina, it was a pleasure to host you

reviews.comments: O bairro em que está localizado é excelente. Seguro, com boas opções de compras e gastronômicas. O apartamento fica em um edifício moderno e com todas as comodidades necessárias. O ponto alto é a vista do apartamento, certamente. Fica próximo do metrô e tem várias opções de serviços básicos na área. Muito bom!
reviews.response: Bienvenidos cuando así gusten!

reviews.comments: Outstanding flat and very responsive host
reviews.response: Thank You, a pleasure

reviews.comments:
Practical studio apartment with stellar views of Buenos Aires. Plenty of restaurants nearby and many of them super nice. Sarkis is an Armenian place 30 minutes walking distance, and many more only 5 minutes walking. Safe to walk to until late evening. 

Nights quiet enough to sleep with window open. 

Really good amenities that we just looked at because we were too tired!
reviews.response: Thank You So much! It was a pleasure to host you

reviews.comments: Very nice place, great location and wonderful view over city and sun set. The place is exactly how described and Cynthia goes the extra mile to ensure her guests feel at home. She was an amazing host.
reviews.response: Thank You Benno, It was a Pleasure!

reviews.comments: Clean, modern and beautiful apartment. Gorgeous view of the city! I miss it already!! Nice neighborhood. Traveled with husband and daughter, we were comfortable but it's small. Great for a couple! Communication was great. We arrived very late and had no problems checking in. Cynthia responded quickly to any questions I had. Would definitely stay here again!
reviews.response: Gracias Erica, un placer recibirlos en una nueva oportunidad.!

reviews.comments:
Cynthia's place far exceed my expectations.  The view(overlooking Palermo SOHO and Hollywood), the location, the amenities, the gym is amazing, the safety, and comfort. She or Laura were available for my simple tourist questions and very available. 
I am so greatful my first experience in Buenos Aires was here.
reviews.response: Eric, Thank You! Doors open anytime for you :)

reviews.comments:
This is the best apartment in Buenos Aires. It is walking distance to some of the best restaurants and nightlife the city has to offer. Cabs are cheap and available at all hours right outside the front gate. Cynthia is an outstanding host. Everything she says and does is honest, truthful, professionally done and fast. She works hard to make everything flow smoothly.
This is our second stay in this apartment and we will return to it on subsequent visits to this wonderful city.
reviews.response: Thank you so much! You are so so nice! Love, and you have doors open anytime! :)

reviews.comments: Had a great time in BA and at this Airbnb. Perfect location for tourists, close to lots of restaurants and bars as well as the subway station that takes right into the city. Checkin was easy. Would definitely recommend this place to a younger couple staying in BA
We had a lovely stay.  Apartment was just as described.  The view was amazing.  Gym and spa were also quite nice.
reviews.response: Thank you, a big pleasure

reviews.comments: Cynthia is an outstanding host. Her apartment is everything she describes and as reviewed by many. What is less said is Cynthia and her helpers go out of their way to make all pre arrival communications fast easy and accurate; the same happens once you arrive and it offering advice and assistance. The apartment is modern, wonderful, very convenient to the excellent neighborhood of Palermo Soho.A++++. Many thanks Cynthia.
reviews.response: Thank You so Much! You are so nice!!! See you in few days

reviews.comments:
Perfectly organized check-in, very flexible. 
Appartement was clean and in Great condition. Location is simply perfect for visiting BA. 
Pively neighborhood with many bars and good restaurants; save to walk, also at night. 
Thank you for making this a great 3 days, Cynthia!
reviews.response: Thanks Christian! Welcome anytime

reviews.comments: Me and my two friends had a great stay at Cynthia's place in BA. It is a bit tight with our luggages but the cleaness, the amenities, the cool neighbourhood that's convenient to hip restaurants and bars are all major pluses. Would recommend my friends to stay here!
reviews.response: Thanks Jen! It was a pleasure

reviews.comments: Excelent clean cozy apartment located very conviniently. Easy access to major parts of the city. Apartment has everything you need with a nice balcony. We enjoyed our stay. Thanks Cynthia and Laura.
reviews.response: Thank You so much!I Wish you a Happy and Great 2017!

reviews.comments: We have just had a fantastic week in Cynthia's beautiful apartment. It is modern, bright and very well equipped. The stunning view over the rooftops of the city is a definite feature and being able to use the very nice pool at the end of a day sight seeing is a real bonus. from the outset Cynthia has been a perfect host. I highly recommend this apartment and hope to return to it in the future.
reviews.response: Thank You so Much for your kind review! It was a big pleasure Liz! Welcome anytime

reviews.comments: Everything was according to our expectations !!!!
reviews.response: Thank You David! Welcome anytime

reviews.comments: We are a family of three (11 year old son) and we had a great stay at Cynthia's apartment.  The area was perfect, the apartment was comfortable, well equipped and had a great view with a balcony.  Cynthia communicated well and helped us with reservations and taxis.  Her friend showed us around the building and gave us a great understanding of the area and what to do.  The pool was great for us after a day of touring the city.  We highly recommend this apartment!  Gracias!
reviews.response: Thank You Ursula! It was a big pleasure to ost you! Welcome anytime!

reviews.comments: Great location, beautiful view of the city. We very much enjoyed Cynthia's modern apartment and the ability to walk to so many places and restaurants. Highly recommend when staying in Buenos Aires!
reviews.response: Thank You So Much for coming!

reviews.comments: The space was just awesome. All the previous reviews are true. The top experience in this apartment is definitely the view from the balcony. We just sat there every night enjoying a glass of Malbec. The sunsets there are just to die for!! 100% recommended.
reviews.response: Thank you so much! It was a pleasure!

reviews.comments: Cynthia did a great job at contacting me before my trip. The first guest in our group was greeted by Laura and given a detailed breakdown of all the apt and building amenities. The apt was small but spacious. It made for a great week in Buenos Aires amongst close friends. Excellent location, very close to Plaza Italia and many cafes and restaurants.
reviews.response: Thank you so much! It was a pleasure to reseive you! Welcome everytime

reviews.comments: Great location in Palermo, close to lots of restaurants, shopping, bars, transportation, etc...Excellent choice for exploring Buenos Aires.  Cynthia is very communicative and helpful as well.  Bonus = the view from the balcony is spectacular and the building has a great gym, spa, and pool.  I would highly recommend.
Such an amazing stay from a fantastic host and fantastic support staff. I would highly recommend!
reviews.response: Thanks Ben!!! :) :) :)

reviews.comments: Posizione fantastica,appartamento delizioso e ospiti incantevoli! Grazie a voi,e a quel fantastico tramonto,il nostro soggiorno a BA e' stato perfetto!
reviews.response: Thank you!!! Welcome back!

reviews.comments: We had a great time, location and amenities were great but it was compact for 2 couples. We had everything we needed and the apartment is very modern,
reviews.response: Thank You! Welcome anytime!

reviews.comments: Small and cute flat in the center of Palermo. Perfect for couples, amazing location and very well equipped. We were warmly welcomed.
reviews.response: Gracias Equi! Un PLacer

reviews.comments: The apartment was very clean.  The location was great.  There were many fun area within walking distance.  We would use it again.

For the individual or couple traveller to Buenos Aires Cynthia's apartment is gold! Situated in Palermo, one of the nicest neighbourhoods in BA, the 21st level provides a wonderful panoramic understanding of the city. The apartment is one thing...Cynthia's on-the-ground support is another. She provided me with suggestions ranging from where to go to what to eat. All up, my first journey to The Paris of the South was made perfect by having the perfect base. Thanks Cynthia!
reviews.response: Thanks Craig! You are so so Nice! It was a big pleasure to receive you. Welcome soon! ;)

reviews.comments: C
Квартира очень хорошая- чистая, есть все необходимое, тихая, wi-fi быстрый. Когда заезжал, все подробно рассказали о близлежащих улицах. Все понравилось, рекомендую.
reviews.response: Thanks, a pleasure

reviews.comments: Cynthia was very helpful and communicated well. Her apartment is well presented, clean, in an accessible area and had all the elements outlined in the description.
Apartamento muito bem localizado, bonito e com um por do sol maravilhoso. A Cynthia é extremamente atenciosa e pronta para ajudar a qualquer momento. 100% recomendado!
reviews.response: Muito Obrigada. Un placer haberlos recibido. Bienvenidos nuevamente!

reviews.comments: It was excellent. . Amazing view! The flat is perfect for a couple. Everything is new and comfortable. Cynthia was a great hoster. Thanks for everything.
reviews.response: Thank you. You were excelent too

reviews.comments: Great apartment and the view is truly spectacular. Definitely a great part of town, a short walk from Plaza Serrano and the nearby shops and restaurants. Muchos Gracias!
reviews.response: Apreciado! Placer en recibirlos
